title: Help fix my game!
body: So everytime I start a game my whole video settings are weird, graphics are on low, resolution is the size of an ipad mini, that kind of stuff i always set them back as i run to lane but they dont save for the next games, i tried reinstalling and fixing what can i do?

replies.body:
I'm here to help!  It seems to me like there might be an issue with your configuration folder, so it's not saving or syncing to the server.  This can happen through manual modifications, or it simply just corrupt.  Your best bet would be to reset your config files to default:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if you have any questions!
